channel.title: Just a bit of help please
channel.description:

item.title: Just a bit of help please
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:

and if i click the dont tele :S

@HiddenPker wrote:

c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("KBD", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; this one is the first image…

//c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); //c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); //c.sendQuest("Camelot", 15239); //c.sendQuest("KBD", 15243); //c.sendQuest("Slayer", 15242); //c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) //c.interfaceGame = 1; c.triggerTele(3347, 3667, 0); and this one is the one i want it to look like.

item.title: Just a bit of help please
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

case 6004: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("KBD", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; break; case 51013: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Rock crabs", 15240); c.sendQuest("Dagg lair", 15241); c.sendQuest("Island", 15239); c.sendQuest("KBD", 15243); c.sendQuest("Slayer tower", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 1; break; case 73116: case 6005: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight pits", 15241); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 15239); c.sendQuest("Assault", 15243); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 2; break; case 51023: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight pits", 15241); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 15239); c.sendQuest("Assault", 15243); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 2;

Read full topic

So make it that when you click something else, it opens up.

String it.

if option2=true

and so on. I wont be spoon feeding tho
